attributes.action: investigate the decision by Worcestershire County Council to close the Llanrug Outdoor Education Centre in Snowdonia
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The recent decision by Worcestershire County Council to close Llanrug at Easter 2008 as part of a cost cutting exercise is  shameful and disgraceful. It is a priceless asset and the many benefits derived by students and other groups using the centre cannot be measured solely in monetary terms. The Council are failing our children in their duty to maintain outdoor education facilities.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "investigate the decision by Worcestershire County Council to close the Llanrug Outdoor Education Centre in Snowdonia."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
